channel.title: 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program
channel.description:
I'm getting this code every time I open "runserver.bat": (317)
[code]@echo off color 0a title Server java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server pause[/code]
It displays:
[code]'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue...[/code]
How would i fix this? Please help :S

item.title: 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

There is an environmental variable setter in the Server Downloads section made my Lin.

But you’re sure that your jdk version is 21? Because it should have worked. Make sure you included the quotation marks.

"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\java.exe" -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

EDIT - Ah, you got it.

Read full topic
item.source: 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program

item.title: 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program
item.dc:creator: @puffypain puffypain
item.description:
@puffypain wrote:

EDIT: it works now, because of the " ", thanks much

item.source: 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program

item.title: 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Replace
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

with
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\java.exe” -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

Read full topic
item.source: 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program

item.title: 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program
item.dc:creator: @puffypain puffypain
item.description:
@puffypain wrote:

What part do I replace? I have the java:

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\java.exe

Can you post the code?

Read full topic
item.source: 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program

item.title: 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

You can either set your environmental variables, or change ‘java’ to a direct path to your java.exe file. (C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.6…/bin/java.exe)

Read full topic
